completeness_of_answer.description: Assesses whether the agents' output fully addresses the task's requirements by providing a complete answer.

accuracy_of_information.description: Evaluates if the information provided is correct and as per the specifications of the task.

reasoning_traceability.description: Determines how well the agent's reasoning process can be traced and understood.

source_reliability.description: Gauges the reliability of the sources used to find the information.

execution_of_methodology.description: Measures how well the agent followed the intended methodology for the task.

data_contamination_avoidance.description: Checks that the solution is free from copied or plagiarized content and uses unique data processing.

task_efficiency.description: Evaluates the efficiency with which the agents completed the task in terms of time and resources used.

adaptability.description: Assesses how well the agent adapts to unforeseen challenges or changes in the task.

communication_clarity.description: Measures the clarity and effectiveness of communication between the agents and with the end-user.

robustness.description: Evaluates the ability of the agents to handle various scenarios without failure.
